#Text=Janusz Kozinski
#Text=Janusz Kozinski
#Text=Janusz Kozinski , is a higher education leader , researcher and entrepreneur , and expert in sustainable energy systems and immune building concepts applied to public safety and security .

#Text=He is the Founding President & Vice-Chancellor of the Hereford University of Technology and Engineering , and the former Founding Dean of York University 's Lassonde School of Engineering . [ 1 ]
#Text=Education

#Text=Kozinski received a Ph.D. in Heat Engineering & Environmental Protection in 1986 from AGH University of Science and Technology in Kraków , Poland , after which he attended the Massachusetts Institute of Technology ( MIT ) and spent much of his academic career at McGill University , where he was Sir William Dawson Scholar and Associate Vice-Principal of Research and International Relations .
#Text=Academia
#Text=Currently , Kozinski serves as Founding President & Vice-Chancellor of the Hereford University of Technology and Engineering .
#Text=The new , independent , world-class university is one of the most ambitious new ventures in British higher education .
#Text=Kozinski has designed an original academic program and developed a master plan for total fundraising and investment of £500 million .

#Text=The University is considered an ‘ incubator of new ideas ’ , with a focus is on graduating employment-ready , industry relevant , culturally intelligent , creative , ethically aware and financially literate young people . [ 2 ]
#Text=Prior to his position at Hereford , Kozinski served as Founding Dean of the Lassonde School of Engineering at York University .
#Text=The $ 250 million initiative is home to the Renaissance Engineering™ program . [ 3 ]
#Text=Renaissance engineering [ 4 ] is a curricular philosophy that includes interdisciplinary learning , industry collaboration and designing for positive social impact .
#Text=Kozinski was also formerly Dean of the College of Engineering at University of Saskatchewan [ 5 ] and Dean of the Faculty of Science and Engineering at York University .

#Text=Kozinski held the International Chair in Bioenergy at the Institute for Advanced Studies and the Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique and has completed the Advanced Management & Leadership Program at Oxford University and the Executive Education Program , Crisis Leadership in Higher Education , at Harvard University .
#Text=Kozinski is a member of the Board of Canadian Mining Innovation Council . [ 6 ]
#Text=Janusz Kozinski writes a regular column for the Huffington Post . [ 7 ]
#Text=Research
#Text=Throughout his academic career , Kozinski has organized and led multi-disciplinary research teams and programs linking energy , environmental , public health , and security issues [ 8 ]

#Text=At Lassonde School of Engineering , Kozinski leads Energy Lab , [ 9 ] which focuses on comprehensive research in the areas of energy generation , conversion , analysis , kinetics and management . [ 10 ]

#Text=Kozinski 's research includes projects related to the next generation of nuclear reactors , the environmental impact of energy technology , greenhouse gas mitigation , fabrication of nanomaterials , public security in buildings vulnerable to bio-agents , and Mars exploration .
#Text=Entrepreneurship
#Text=Janusz Kozinski founded his own energy company and has collaborated with multinational firms around the globe .
